summary: **Alan Wake** is a 2010 action-adventure game about a crime novelist who tries to solve his wife's disappearance in the fictional town of Bright Falls. As he investigates, events from his latest novel (which he can't remember writing) come to life. The game is like a TV thriller with six episodes and extra content. It was first on Xbox 360, then PC, and later remastered for modern consoles. Critics loved it for its story, visuals, and atmosphere. A sequel, **Alan Wake 2**, released in 2023.
title: Alan Wake
